component.name: ProtonUp-Qt
component.summary: Install Wine- and Proton-based compatibility tools
Installa tool di compatibilità basati su Wine e Proton
Installeer op Wine en Proton gebaseerde compatibiliteitshulpmiddelen
Zainstaluj narzędzia kompatybilności oparte na Wine i Protonie
安裝基於 Win 和 Proton 的相容工具

description.p: Install and manage Wine- and Proton-based compatibility tools for Steam and Lutris with this graphical user interface.

ul.li: Both normal, Snap and Flatpak installations are supported

description.p: Double click compatibility tools to show more information and games using the tool.
Advanced settings and the color theme can be managed in the About dialog.
